title: No ranked in alpha?
body: I cant seem to find anything about it, so i dont know if its a bug or not. If you cant play ranked with it, then unfortunately wont be using it.

replies.body:
Ranked is a sensitive feature. We can't afford to ship with bugs that could affect your match set up, ex. pick champion, runes, masteries, bans. We would kick ourselves if bugs like that could potentially put you at a disadvantage that would cause you an ELO drop. Also, the penalties for failing to join/start a ranked match are higher. If a bug would prevent you from correctly starting a game, you would be unfairly penalized.

The client is still on Alpha, ranked will come once we have a more stable and polished product.
Not yet. Probably too much risk of someone losing LP to a menu bug.
